title: As Casinos Close, Atlantic City Tries To Pivot Focus Elsewhere
teaser: Thousands of employees lost their casino jobs with the closure of the Showboat and Revel casinos in Atlantic City. This is the latest development in a painful transition for Atlantic City, which faces greater competition for gamblers from neighboring states.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
